org.apache.flink.core.fs

类 CloseableRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.util.AbstractCloseableRegistry<java.io.Closeable,java.lang.Object>
      • org.apache.flink.core.fs.CloseableRegistry
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @Internal
public class CloseableRegistry
extends AbstractCloseableRegistry<java.io.Closeable,java.lang.Object>
    This class allows to register instances of Closeable, which are all closed if this registry is closed.

    Registering to an already closed registry will throw an exception and close the provided Closeable

    All methods in this class are thread-safe.

      • doRegister

        protected void doRegister(@Nonnull
                          java.io.Closeable closeable,
                          @Nonnull
                          java.util.Map<java.io.Closeable,java.lang.Object> closeableMap)
        从类复制的说明: AbstractCloseableRegistry
        Does the actual registration of the closeable with the registry map. This should not do any long running or potentially blocking operations as is is executed under the registry's lock.
        指定者:
        doRegister 在类中 AbstractCloseableRegistry<java.io.Closeable,java.lang.Object>

      • doUnRegister

        protected boolean doUnRegister(@Nonnull
                               java.io.Closeable closeable,
                               @Nonnull
                               java.util.Map<java.io.Closeable,java.lang.Object> closeableMap)
        从类复制的说明: AbstractCloseableRegistry
        Does the actual un-registration of the closeable from the registry map. This should not do any long running or potentially blocking operations as is is executed under the registry's lock.
        指定者:
        doUnRegister 在类中 AbstractCloseableRegistry<java.io.Closeable,java.lang.Object>
